references: Repealing: Ord 17565, Ord 17752, Ord 17962, Ord 18384, Ord 18763, Ord 19785, Ord 20273, Ord 20363, Ord 21661. Amending Ord 16227.
summary: An ordinance designating the officers and men of the Police Department of the City of Seattle, prescribing their powers and duties, fixing their salaries, and repealing Ordinances Nos. 17565, 17752, 17962, 18384, 18763, 19785, 20273, 20363, 21661 and sections 1 and 2, of Ordinance No. 16227.
